Articles.Content:
i was trying to design a reusable launcher that can carry probe into a sub-orbital trajectory and then re-enter atmosphere, use chutes etc.

but this happened (i tried it for few times but same thing happens)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/oUphC4XbonU?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

notice that decoupler is towards heat shield
So the heatshield inter-stage fairing causes self destruct on the main vessel?

Punted to Support & Development subforum. Please, before reporting bugs in the future, make sure you read [this post](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92230-!!!-PLEASE-READ-BEFORE-POSTING-!!!-Stock-Support-Bug-Reporting-Guide) ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
